org.nd4j.jita.allocator.pointers

Class CudaPointer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.nd4j.jita.allocator.pointers.CudaPointer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    cublasHandle_t, CUcontext, cudaEvent_t, cudaStream_t

    public class CudaPointer
extends org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
    This class is simple logic-less holder for pointers derived from CUDA. PLEASE NOTE: 1. All pointers are blind, and do NOT care about length/capacity/offsets/strides whatever 2. They are really blind. Even data type is unknown.
